mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food (food_no, seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_name, food_quant, food_expiry_date, food_origin, food_sale, food_flavor, food_price, food_carbo, food_protein, food_fat, food_cal, food_image) VALUES (#{foodNo}, #{sellerEmail}, #{foodCatANo}, #{foodCatBNo}, #{foodCatCNo}, #{foodName}, #{foodQuant}, #{foodExpiryDate}, #{foodOrigin}, #{foodSale}, #{foodFlavor}, #{foodPrice}, #{foodCarbo}, #{foodProtein}, #{foodFat}, #{foodCal}, #{foodImage})
mapper.select: SELECT food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_cat_a_name FROM food_cat_a WHERE food_cat_c_no = #{foodCatCNo} and food_cat_b_no = #{foodCatBNo}
SELECT food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_cat_b_name FROM food_cat_b WHERE food_cat_c_no = #{foodCatCNo}
